verbs.description: Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators [V: have] questioned a Russian oligarch about hundreds of thousands of dollars in payments his company 's US affiliate made to President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , after the election , according to a source familiar with the matter .

[ARG0: Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators] have [V: questioned] [ARG2: a Russian oligarch] [ARG1: about hundreds of thousands of dollars in payments his company 's US affiliate made to President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , after the election] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a source familiar with the matter] .

Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators have questioned a Russian oligarch about hundreds of thousands of dollars in [ARG1: payments] [ARG0: his company 's US affiliate] [V: made] [ARG2: to President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen ,] [ARGM-TMP: after the election] , according to a source familiar with the matter .

Special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigators have questioned a Russian oligarch about hundreds of thousands of dollars in payments his company 's US affiliate made to President Donald Trump 's personal attorney , Michael Cohen , after the election , [V: according] to a source familiar with the matter .
